description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows Remote Access Connection Manager information disclosure vulnerability (CVE-2024-30069), it is essential to apply the respective update to ensure system integrity:

1. Identify your Windows version and ensure you are running the required build number.
2. Download the appropriate update package from the Microsoft Update Catalog.
3. Install the update, following the on-screen instructions.
4. Restart your system to apply the changes effectively.

**Details**:
- This update addresses a buffer over-read vulnerability that could lead to information disclosure.
- The update packages can be found at:
  - [KB5039211](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039211)
  - [KB5039212](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039212)
  - [KB5039213](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039213)
  - [KB5039225](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039225)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure that your system is running one of the affected build numbers listed.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
